form.title: Set allowed algorithms
form.description: Only the algorithms selected here will be allowed to run on your dataset. Uncheck all to remove any access to your dataset.

data.name: publisherTrustedAlgorithms
data.label: Selected Algorithms
data.help: Choose one or multiple algorithms you trust to allow them to run on this dataset.

data.name: allowAllPublishedAlgorithms
data.label: Allow Algorithms
data.help: Choose how to allow algorithms to run on this dataset.

data.name: publisherTrustedAlgorithmPublishers
data.label: Allow Trusted Algorithm Publishers
data.help: You can optionally specify the wallet addresses of trusted publishers. Only algorithms published by these addresses will be allowed to run.

data.name: publisherTrustedAlgorithmPublishersAddresses
data.label: Publisher Addresses
data.help: Enter the wallet addresses of trusted algorithm publishers.
